title: Please fix! I'm getting an error that says "something went wrong." When the camera will open
content:
Please fix! I'm getting an error that says "something went wrong." When the camera will open, 90 percent of the time the camera goes blurry and won't focus rendering it useless. This has been
happening since early February. I need my camera and really don't want to have to switch to a competitor phone to have a good working camera .
